basics.name: Dongjun Lee
basics.label: AI Researcher/Scientist
basics.summary: An AI researcher born in Korea, specializing in recommendation systems and large language models.

work.name: Maum AI Inc.
work.summary: I research large language models at the Brain Team, focusing on fine-tuning them for specific purposes. I also participate in an on-device language model project in collaboration with machine learning engineers.

education.area: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering

awards.title: Best Paper Awards

awards.title: Summa Cum laude
